name: TriRampo
author: Anubi
description:
Inspired
 by one of my past palettes (Rampy16), this 12 color palette has 3 color
 ramps, with each of these connecting with the same brightest color 
(white) and their respective darkest color (such as purple and dark 
blue, or blue/purple and black). Made with versatility in mind while 
also being colorful.
